name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior ML Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess a strong expertise in **Python** and **C++**, complemented by a proven track record in advanced machine learning techniques, including **transformers**, **GANs**, and **diffusion** models. My background in developing **Text-To-Speech** systems and implementing **voice conversion** via cutting-edge **ASR** and **Source Separation** methodologies equips me with the necessary skills to excel in this role. I am adept at building and deploying machine learning models using **torchscript** and **onnx**, and I have extensive experience with production-grade **MLOps** practices to ensure seamless model lifecycle management.

I also bring hands-on technical prowess in using **Kubernetes** and **Docker** for containerization and orchestration, ensuring robust deployments and scalability. My previous work includes leading enterprise-grade projects focused on integrating AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and intelligent automation in the healthcare and financial sectors. I have a solid foundation in cloud technologies, particularly **Azure** and **AWS**, and I consistently uphold compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, ensuring the security and reliability of the solutions I develop.
